Server.Name: Great White North Server
Server.Description:
Discord: https://discord.gg/CseFaRD
Selection of mods for the Great White North vanilla server
A special thanks to Spherii for making the Mod Launcher. It has made running a server so much easier. Many thanks to all the mod creators for their hard work. All mods used are unmodified.
Mods included:
30K Item Stack - Elucidus 3 Slot Forge - Khaine 60 Slot Backpack - Khaine A19 Farming For A20 - Syco54645 A20 Server Side Vehicles - Snufkin/oakraven Auto Miner - Snufkin Bdubs Vehicles Better Lights - PhD bhwFashionista - Nuvar bhwInteriorDesign - Nuvar bhwNutsAndBolts - Nuvar bhwPowerPlant - Nuvar bhwReinforcedDoors - Nuvar Bloodmoon Until Dawn - Jax Teller Car Respawner - Ana Chicken Coops - Khaine Crafting Queue - Jax Teller Decorations Pack For A20 - Telric Disable Falling Trees - Valmar DrsA20PickItUp - Drconfused Eggs In Fridges - Jax Teller Grass Cutter (RussianDood) H7SB Carts - Eihwaz H7SB Domestication - Eihwaz H7SB Fishing - Eihwaz Harry's Better Supply Drops - BobbyLee298 Hud Plus - AuroraGiggleFairy (AGF) Hud plus EPatch - AuroraGiggleFairy (AGF) Lockable Inventory Slots - Khaine Longer Loot Bags - Donovan Loud Sounds Lowered - Robeloto More Containers - Eric Beaudoin More Supercorn Use - TangoDown/Schizo Quicker Intro Quests - AuroraGiggleFairy (AFG) Return of Log Spikes - Khaine Starter Class System - Valmar Super Glasses - chichos Unnecessarily Beautiful But Immersive - Ztensity Vehicle Overhaul Madness - Ragsy/ActiniumTiger Working Microwave - Jax Teller Working Stuff - Saminal Working Ice Machine - CronosusCZ Zombie Reach Shortened - Jax Teller
